Detailed Description

Class to represent a daisy chain of boards.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

shiftChain::shiftChain ( uint8_t  boardCount,
shiftBoard **  boards,
uint8_t  dataPin,
uint8_t  clockPin,
uint8_t  latchPin,
uint8_t  resetPin 
)

Create a new daisy chain object, without an index output.

Parameters:
boardCountThe number of boards in the chain
boardsArray of pointers to ShiftBoard objects
dataPinArduino pin number to be used for the data line
clockPinArduino pin number to be used for the clock line
latchPinArduino pin number to be used for the latch line
resetPinArduino pin number to be used for the master reset line
shiftChain::shiftChain ( uint8_t  boardCount,
shiftBoard **  boards,
uint8_t  dataPin,
uint8_t  clockPin,
uint8_t  latchPin,
uint8_t  resetPin,
uint8_t  indexPin 
)

Create a new daisy chain object, with an index output.

Parameters:
boardCountThe number of boards in the chain
boardsArray of pointers to ShiftBoard objects
dataPinArduino pin number to be used for the data line
clockPinArduino pin number to be used for the clock line
latchPinArduino pin number to be used for the latch line
resetPinArduino pin number to be used for the master reset line
indexPinArduino pin number to be used for an index output

uint8_t shiftChain::startTimer ( uint8_t  prescaler,
uint8_t  timerVal,
uint8_t  timer 
)

Start the timer.

Parameters:
prescalerSelect the timer pre-scaler. Defaults to 1024
timerValSelect a value for the timer to reset to, for precise control of frequency
timerSelect the timer to use; only Timer 2 works currently

Shut down the current timer.
